API_Description: Flattens the form fields and annotations in the PDF document, making them part of the page content.
API_Description_Reason: The method name 'flattenPages' suggests that it is used to flatten interactive elements like form fields and annotations into the static content of the PDF pages.
Returns: A boolean indicating whether the flattening operation was successful.
Returns_Reason: Typically, methods that perform operations on documents return a boolean to indicate success or failure.
